body:
Ah, It didn’t look like I had merge privileges, but it seems I do.  I, too, was confused by that.  But I’ve merged it now.

 

Kyle Gross

Open Science Grid Operations

Operations Support Manager

OSG Outreach Coordinator

Indiana University Research Technologies

 

 

From: DrDaveD <notifications@github.com>
Reply-To: opensciencegrid/operations <reply@reply.github.com>
Date: Thursday, January 18, 2018 at 12:30 PM
To: opensciencegrid/operations <operations@noreply.github.com>
Cc: "Gross, Kyle Anthony" <kagross@iu.edu>, Mention <mention@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [opensciencegrid/operations] Clarify some wording in external oasis repo instructions (#123)

 

Ok good. Do you have merge privileges or is someone else supposed to do that?

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
